name: Christoph Sawade
body:
![Christoph Sawade](images/foto.jpg)

### Brief Bio
I obtained a M.Sc. in computer science ("Diplom Informatik") from the [Humboldt Universität zu Berlin](http://www.hu-berlin.de/?set_language=en&cl=en), Germany in April 2009 and a Ph.D. in machine learning ("Dr. rer. nat.") from the [University of Potsdam](http://www.uni-potsdam.de/en/university-of-potsdam.html), Germany, in May 2013. After finishing my PhD in 2013, I left university and joined [SoundCloud](soundcloud.com) as a machine learning engineer.

### Research Interests
My research interests include theory and techniques in machine learning and statistics, in particular, for active learning and evaluation, learning under distribution shift, and structured learning in the context of scalable ranking of online ads.

### Software
Check my [Git repositories](https://github.com/BigCrunsh/).

### Publications
* Michael Großhans, Christoph Sawade, Tobias Scheffer, and Niels Landwehr. Joint Prediction of Topics in a URL Hierarchy. Proceedings of the 24th European Conference on Machine Learning (ECML-2014), Nancy, France, 2014 (to appear). 

* Christoph Sawade. [Active Evaluation of Predictive Models](http://nbn-resolving.de/urn:nbn:de:kobv:517-opus-65583). _PhD thesis_, Universitätsverlag Potsdam, 2013.

* Michael Großhans, Christoph Sawade, Michael Brückner, and Tobias Scheffer. [Bayesian Games for Adversarial Regression Problems](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/icml2013-bayesian-games.pdf) (with [appendix](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/icml2013-bayesian-games-appendix.pdf)). _Proceedings of the 30th International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML-2013)_, Atlanta, USA, 2013. JMLR: W&CP volume 28.

* Christoph Sawade, Steffen Bickel, Timo von Oertzen, Tobias Scheffer, and Niels Landwehr. [Active Evaluation of Ranking Functions based on Graded Relevance (Extended Abstract)](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/ijcai2013-active_rank.pdf). _Proceedings of the 23rd International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence (IJCAI-2013)_, Invited Track on Best Papers from Sister Conferences, Beijing, China, 2013.

* Christoph Sawade, Steffen Bickel, Timo von Oertzen, Tobias Scheffer, and Niels Landwehr. [Active Evaluation of Ranking Functions based on Graded Relevance](http://link.springer.com/article/10.1007%2Fs10994-013-5372-5). _Machine Learning Journal_, 2013, 10.1007/s10994-013-5372-5.

* Christoph Sawade, Niels Landwehr, and Tobias Scheffer. [Active Comparison of Prediction Models](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/nips2012-active-comparison.pdf) (with [appendix](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/nips2012-active-comparison-appendix.pdf)). _Proceedings of the 26th Annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NIPS-2012)_, Lake Tahoe, USA, 2012.

* Christoph Sawade, Steffen Bickel, Timo von Oertzen, Tobias Scheffer, and Niels Landwehr. [Active Evaluation of Ranking Functions based on Graded Relevance](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/ecml2012-active.pdf). _Proceedings of the 22nd European Conference on Machine Learning (ECML-2012)_, Bristol, England, 2012. **Best Paper Award**

* Paul Prasse, Christoph Sawade, Niels Landwehr and Tobias Scheffer. [Learning to Identify Regular Expressions that Describe Email Campaigns](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/icml2012-regular-expressions.pdf) (with [appendix](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/icml2012-regular-expressions-appendix.pdf)). _Proceedings of the 29th International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML-2012)_, Edinburgh, Scotland, 2012. 

* Christoph Sawade, Niels Landwehr, and Tobias Scheffer. [Active Estimation of F-measures](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/nips2010-active.pdf) (with [appendix](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/nips2010-active-appendix.pdf)). _Proceedings of the 24th Annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NIPS-2010)_, Vancouver, Canada, 2010.

* Christoph Sawade, Niels Landwehr, Steffen Bickel, and Tobias Scheffer. [Active Risk Estimation](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/icml2010_activeEval.pdf). _Proceedings of the 27th International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML-2010)_, Haifa, Israel, 2010.

* Steffen Bickel, Christoph Sawade, Tobias Scheffer. [Transfer Learning by Distribution Matching for Targeted Advertising](http://cs.uni-potsdam.de/ml/publications/nips2008_transfer.pdf). _Proceedings of the 22th Annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NIPS-2008)_, Vancouver, Canada, 2008.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
